name: Eco-Friendly Bamboo Toothbrush
description: A biodegradable toothbrush made from sustainably sourced bamboo. Soft bristles provide effective cleaning without harming sensitive gums.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable, 100% organic cotton t-shirt available in multiple colors. Perfect for eco-conscious consumers who care about both comfort and the environment.

name: Reusable Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-walled, insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. Made from BPA-free, high-grade stainless steel.

name: Eco-Friendly Shopping Bag
description: Reusable shopping bag made from recycled materials. Durable and easy to fold, perfect for groceries or everyday use.

name: Natural Beeswax Candles
description: Hand-poured candles made from 100% natural beeswax. Free from toxins and synthetic fragrances, creating a cozy, eco-friendly ambiance.

name: Organic Herbal Tea Set
description: A variety pack of organic, loose-leaf herbal teas. Sourced from sustainable farms and packaged in compostable bags.

name: Recycled Notebook Set
description: Set of 3 notebooks made from recycled paper. Ideal for students, artists, or eco-conscious professionals.

name: Vegan Leather Wallet
description: Sleek and durable wallet made from high-quality vegan leather. Multiple compartments for cards, cash, and coins.
